## Chess.deleteComments() method

Delete comments for all positions.

**Signature:**

```typescript
deleteComments(): void;
```
**Returns:**

void

## Example


```js
const chess = new Chess()

chess.loadPgn("1. e4 e5 {king's pawn opening} 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bc4 Bc5 {giuoco piano} *")

chess.deleteComments()
chess.getComments()
// -> []
```
